display_long_description:
Ultra Height 2 takes VR climbing to new heights with 100+ intense challenges across 10 massive worlds. Inspired by Ultra Height: Mist City Climb, this game combines grapple gun action, web-swinging, and extreme flying for a heart-pounding vertical adventure. Master climbing, moving platforms, ziplining, jet rockets, parachute jumps, and gravity-defying stunts. Conquer skyscrapers, cliffs, and futuristic cities as you swing like a superhero and soar through the skies.

🗻 Key Features:

Grapple Gun and Web-Swinging – Fly through the air like a true hero.

Jet Rockets and Wingsuits – Blast through the skies at extreme speeds.

Zipline and Parachute Jumps – Defy gravity and dive from dizzying heights.

Free Exploration Mode – Roam freely, uncover secrets, and find hidden tools.

Global Leaderboards – Compete for the top spot and earn exclusive rewards.

🗺️ Explore 10 Massive Maps:

Indoor Playground

Outdoor Playground

New Mist City

Rocky Mountains

High Playground

New Sky City

Antenna Isle

Private Island

The Ultra Mall

Sky Bay

⚠️ Warning: Stay above the fog or the game restarts. Don’t look down!
